s1.title: What is it?
s1.p: Cocoon2 is a complete rewrite of the Cocoon XML publishing framework that is supposed to remove all those design constraint that emerged from the Cocoo1 experience.

This documentation is alpha, like anything else, so don't expect that much. If you are not a developer and you are not willing to test new stuff that may not work as expected, we suggest you to refer to the latest Cocoon1 release which is very stable.
Otherwise, if you are brave enough, we welcome you into this new world of XML wonders :-)
